TopicTitle: SE-14 Super easy to fly FAR airplane (full keyboard capable)

Articles.Content:
We at Roaken are glad to present

SE-14 sets the line for simplicity and efficiency.

It beat the record of development time, taking only 5 days from first build to a released state.

Using cannards and upward cranked tips deltas, the only difference between flying it with a keyborad and joystick is that the keyboard responds faster.

Due to it's wing setup and size, it's actually a stealth fighter, super reliable maneuvers put it ahead in terms of bigger planes interception.

You can pull it as hard as you want, warranty covers structural failure.

You can find more planes like this at our page!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84738-Roaken-Corporation-High-end-FAR-planes

Edited July 9, 2014 by Roaken Corporation

Thank you!

If possible, please tell us what you think about it's flight characteristics.

We are concerned with making the best aircraft we can, and feedback is essential.
